feed.title: Re: [BIP Proposal] Mempool Validation and Relay Policies via User-Defined Scripts]

entry.title: Re: [BIP Proposal] Mempool Validation and Relay Policies via User-Defined Scripts]
entry.summary: This email inquires about the testing of compact blocks relay with the default setting for `blockreconstructionextratxn` in knots version 29.1. It highlights a specific technical aspect of Bitcoin development, indicating an interest or need for information on the effectiveness or functionality of compact block relays in a particular version of the software. The nature of the inquiry suggests that it is directed towards individuals with experience or insight into the nuances of Bitcoin's network protocols and their implementation in different software versions, such as Knots v29.1. This discussion is part of a larger conversation within the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, a forum for developers and interested parties to exchange ideas, solutions, and updates related to Bitcoin development efforts.
